class bhp_dispatch.models.Dispatch(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bhp_dispatch.models.base_dispatch.BaseDispatch

Dispatch(created, modified, user_created, user_modified, hostname_created, hostname_modified, id, producer_id, is_dispatched, dispatch_datetime, return_datetime, dispatch_items)

Name :

dispatch
Table :

bhp_dispatch_dispatch
Parameters:
  • producer_id (ForeignKey) – Producer / netbook
  • is_dispatched (BooleanField) – Is dispatched
  • dispatch_datetime (DateTimeField) – Dispatch date
  • return_datetime (DateTimeField) – Return date
  • dispatch_items (TextField) – Dispatch items. One per line.
class bhp_dispatch.models.DispatchItem(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bhp_dispatch.models.base_dispatch.BaseDispatch

DispatchItem(created, modified, user_created, user_modified, hostname_created, hostname_modified, id, producer_id, is_dispatched, dispatch_datetime, return_datetime, dispatch_id, item_identifier, subject_identifiers)

Name :

dispatch item
Table :

bhp_dispatch_dispatchitem
Parameters:
  • producer_id (ForeignKey) – Producer / netbook
  • is_dispatched (BooleanField) – Is dispatched
  • dispatch_datetime (DateTimeField) – Dispatch date
  • return_datetime (DateTimeField) – Return date
  • dispatch_id (ForeignKey) – Dispatch
  • item_identifier (CharField) – Dispatch Item (e.g. Household Identifier)
  • subject_identifiers (TextField) – Subject identifiers associated with this Dispatch Item
